content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings, Haoyu Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that as we discussed beforehand, only the rental price negotiation is part of our interaction here. With that said, I am eager to hear your proposed rental price for this desirable location and premium apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. Let's talk about the rental price. I propose 1000 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I regret to say, Haoyu Wang, that your proposed price does not meet my expectations. However, let me consider it and get back to you with my counteroffer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Now, my counteroffer for the rental price would be 1150 Euro per month. I believe this price reflects both the high demand for such a central location and the outstanding features of this newly built apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the counteroffer. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and its location, I propose 1050 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While your revised offer is slightly more appealing than before, it still falls short of my desired rental amount. I must stand firm on my original counteroffer of 1150 Euro per month. I appreciate your interest and ongoing negotiations, Haoyu Wang.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Understood. I accept your counteroffer of 1150 Euro per month.

[Your response]
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1150 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I've given it some more thought and I believe that the price of 1150 Euro is too low for the services and facilities offered. I would like to revise the price to 1250 Euro.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, it appears your changing position has grown less favorable to me. As previously stated, I had accepted your earlier proposal of 1150 Euro. However, with your recent increase to 1250 Euro, I must reevaluate my stance. Unfortunately, I cannot continue negotiations at this revised price and will have to decline your proposal. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
